page.title: Bankrupt U.S. Airways Posts Wider Loss
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Bankrupt US Airways Group Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=UAIRQ.OB target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">UAIRQ.OB</A> on Thursday reported a wider third-quarter net loss as storms and high fuel prices hurt results.
